name: Brew & Bites Café
description: Modern café specializing in artisan coffee and fresh pastries. Popular brunch spot with a vibrant community atmosphere.

reviews.author: Sarah Ahmed
reviews.text: Amazing brunch menu! The avocado toast and flat white combo is perfection.

reviews.author: Rizwan Khan
reviews.text: Great coffee and good vibes. Parking can be tricky though.

reviews.author: Mira Hassan
reviews.text: My favorite weekend spot! The croissants are fresh and the staff is super friendly.
